nodes.text: Krupo was a beast wrangler who worked for Yarvok, a Nova Blades lieutenant. By 3626 BBY, a ship carrying Krupo and many of Yarvok's pets crashed on the planet Dantooine. Though an individual named Jayse advised Yarvok to be glad to everyone made it out alive, Yarvok was furious that his prized pets, Rox, Yug, Wa-Vendeg, Flappy, Fuzzy, Spike, and Ol' Cronchy were missing. Yarvok told Krupo that he was a "son of a murglak" and threatened to kill Krupo if his missing pets were not found and returned quickly because Yarvok believed his pets were frightened and alone without their "papa."

Krupo was mentioned in the Codex entry for Invasive Species on Dantooine in the 2019 expansion Onslaught to the 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare.
